name: doctrine-extensions/common
description: Common code shared among packages from DoctrineExtensions

suggest.ext-mongo: to use the extensions with the MongoDB ODM
suggest.ext-pdo: to use the extensions with the ORM
suggest.doctrine/mongodb-odm: to use the extensions with the MongoDB ODM
suggest.doctrine/mongodb: to use the extensions with the MongoDB ODM
suggest.doctrine/orm: to use the extensions with the ORM
